ModMetaData.name: Mechanoid Hibernation
ModMetaData.author: CrunchyDuck
ModMetaData.description:
[h2]what it do[/h2] Mechs will use 50% less bandwidth when assign to "Dormant self-charging" (Adjustable in settings). Bandwidth used by mechanoids will show up as blue squares. While hibernating, mechs will ignore all stimuli until ordered to stop hibernating. If the mechanitor doesn't have enough bandwidth, the mech will not wake up till they do.
[h2]Compatibility[/h2] Can be added to saves. Can be removed from saves if no mechs are hibernating. Compatible with newly added mech types.
